text: John William Ashe (20 August 1954 â€“ 22 June 2016) was an Antiguan politician. He was the President of the United Nations General Assembly at its 68th session, which ran September 2013 to September 2014. He was also the ambassador to the United Nations for Antigua and Barbuda between 1995 and 2004. Ashe died from a heart attack at his home in Dobbs Ferry, New York on 22 June 2016 while awaiting trial by the United States Federal Court.Steven Visser & Rob Frehse, John Ashe, ex-U.N. leader indicted last year, dies, CNN (June 23, 2016). He was 61. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Antigua and Barbuda politicians Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Presidents of the United Nations General Assembly
title: John William Ashe
